q: What I hope is that Kelsey Grammer and I can improve our communications and truly co-parent our two wonderful children," her statement said. She also wished her ex and his fiancee, Kayte Walsh , love and happiness in their new marriage. Kelsey Grammer , 55, told David Letterman on his show last month that he plans to marry Kayte Walsh sometime in February. The veteran actor starred in the comedy series "Cheers" and "Frasier."

You never know what Simon Cowell has up his sleeve, and since he will be working both behind and in front of the camera, the country should brace itself to expect the unexpected. While we don't miss Simon Cowell on "American Idol" that much, this certainly throws a whole new twist on singing competitions in the U.S.

Eric Schmidt is also keeping for himself the outside-facing parts of CEO-dom, which Silicon Vally nerds by their nature are pretty bad at. He has a clumsy way of putting it, but when he talks about the deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership that are increasingly important given Google's global reach, he basically means the large part of the CEO job which involves schmoozing various people in Google's interest. The shirky wording of the statement he issued today does not exactly enhance his reputation for straightforwardness. Unfortunately, continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role, Andy Coulson said.
